languages.text: "Раскопки? Хм. Возможно, экспедиция, точнее, ее цели и стали объектом интереса Эмелины. Конечно, было бы проще узнать у нее самой..." {n}Дознаватель посылает вам красноречивый и нетерпеливый взгляд.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Раскопки? Хм. Возможно, экспедиция, точнее, ее цели и стали объектом интереса Эмелины. Конечно, было бы проще узнать у нее самой..." {n}Дознаватель посылает вам красноречивый и нетерпеливый взгляд.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Excavations? Hmm. Perhaps the expedition, or rather, its objectives, were what Emelina was interested in. Of course, the easiest option would be to ask her directly..." {n}The Interrogator shoots you a pointed, impatient look.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Раскопки? Хм. Возможно, экспедиция, точнее, ее цели и стали объектом интереса Эмелины. Конечно, было бы проще узнать у нее самой..." {n}Дознаватель посылает вам красноречивый и нетерпеливый взгляд.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Excavations? Hmm. Perhaps the expedition, or rather, its objectives, were what Emelina was interested in. Of course, the easiest option would be to ask her directly..." {n}The Interrogator shoots you a pointed, impatient look.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Excavations? Hmm. Perhaps the expedition, or rather, its objectives, were what Emelina was interested in. Of course, the easiest option would be to ask her directly..." {n}The Interrogator shoots you a pointed, impatient look.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Excavations? Hmm. Perhaps the expedition, or rather, its objectives, were what Emelina was interested in. Of course, the easiest option would be to ask her directly..." {n}The Interrogator shoots you a pointed, impatient look.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “挖掘场？嗯，或许这正是艾米莉娜感兴趣的事情。或者说，她感兴趣的是挖出来的东西。当然，最简单的方法还是直接问她……”{n}海因里希朝你投来了不耐烦的尖锐眼神。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Excavations? Hmm. Perhaps the expedition, or rather, its objectives, were what Emelina was interested in. Of course, the easiest option would be to ask her directly..." {n}The Interrogator shoots you a pointed, impatient look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “挖掘场？嗯，或许这正是艾米莉娜感兴趣的事情。或者说，她感兴趣的是挖出来的东西。当然，最简单的方法还是直接问她……”{n}海因里希朝你投来了不耐烦的尖锐眼神。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «¿Excavaciones? Mmm. Tal vez la expedición, o, mejor dicho, sus objetivos, fuera lo que realmente interesara a Emelina. Por supuesto, lo más rápido sería preguntárselo directamente...». {n}El interrogador te lanza una mirada impaciente y mordaz.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Excavations? Hmm. Perhaps the expedition, or rather, its objectives, were what Emelina was interested in. Of course, the easiest option would be to ask her directly..." {n}The Interrogator shoots you a pointed, impatient look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Excavaciones? Mmm. Tal vez la expedición, o, mejor dicho, sus objetivos, fuera lo que realmente interesara a Emelina. Por supuesto, lo más rápido sería preguntárselo directamente...». {n}El interrogador te lanza una mirada impaciente y mordaz.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「発掘？うーん。もしかしたら、エメリナさんが興味を持ったのはこの遠征、あるいはむしろその目的だったのかもしれません。もちろん、一番簡単な方法は彼女に直接聞くことでしょうが…」{n}インテロゲイターはあなたへと鋭く、苛立ったような視線を向ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Excavations? Hmm. Perhaps the expedition, or rather, its objectives, were what Emelina was interested in. Of course, the easiest option would be to ask her directly..." {n}The Interrogator shoots you a pointed, impatient look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「発掘？うーん。もしかしたら、エメリナさんが興味を持ったのはこの遠征、あるいはむしろその目的だったのかもしれません。もちろん、一番簡単な方法は彼女に直接聞くことでしょうが…」{n}インテロゲイターはあなたへと鋭く、苛立ったような視線を向ける。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Des fouilles ? Hmm. C'était peut-être à l'expédition qu'Emelina s'intéressait, ou plutôt, à ses objectifs. Évidemment, le plus simple serait de lui poser la question directement... » {n}L'interrogateur vous décoche un regard impatient.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Excavations? Hmm. Perhaps the expedition, or rather, its objectives, were what Emelina was interested in. Of course, the easiest option would be to ask her directly..." {n}The Interrogator shoots you a pointed, impatient look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Des fouilles ? Hmm. C'était peut-être à l'expédition qu'Emelina s'intéressait, ou plutôt, à ses objectifs. Évidemment, le plus simple serait de lui poser la question directement... » {n}L'interrogateur vous décoche un regard impatient.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ausgrabungen? Hmm. Vielleicht war Emelina an der Expedition oder ihren Zielen interessiert. Am einfachsten wäre natürlich, sie direkt zu fragen ..." {n}Der Interrogator wirft dir einen gezielten, ungeduldigen Blick zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Excavations? Hmm. Perhaps the expedition, or rather, its objectives, were what Emelina was interested in. Of course, the easiest option would be to ask her directly..." {n}The Interrogator shoots you a pointed, impatient look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ausgrabungen? Hmm. Vielleicht war Emelina an der Expedition oder ihren Zielen interessiert. Am einfachsten wäre natürlich, sie direkt zu fragen ..." {n}Der Interrogator wirft dir einen gezielten, ungeduldigen Blick zu.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Kazılar ha? Hımm. Belki de Emelina'nın ilgilendiği şey, bu keşif seferi... Daha doğrusu seferin amaçlarıdır. Elbette en kolay seçenek, direkt olarak ona sormak olur." {n}Sorgucu sana anlamlı ve sabırsız bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Excavations? Hmm. Perhaps the expedition, or rather, its objectives, were what Emelina was interested in. Of course, the easiest option would be to ask her directly..." {n}The Interrogator shoots you a pointed, impatient look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kazılar ha? Hımm. Belki de Emelina'nın ilgilendiği şey bu keşif seferi, ya da daha doğrusu seferin amaçlarıdır. Elbette en kolay seçenek direkt olarak ona sormak olur." {n}Sorgucu sana anlamlı ve sabırsız bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
